title: [K-12] Collaboration Conflict Management Strategies Between Instructional Designers and Faculty

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics education and core instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Analysis of conflict cases between instructional designers and faculty during elementary mathematics curriculum development in vocational training institutions to explore effective collaboration strategies

learning_goals: Identify three major types of conflicts (design/philosophical/communication) arising during curriculum development
Propose at least two collaboration strategies applicable to each conflict situation
Clearly define role boundaries between faculty and instructional designers in blended learning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
